content:
I don’t know yet—what is your favorite color? If you tell me (a name or hex code), I’ll remember it for future chats.

## TL;DR
- I don’t have your favorite color on record.
- Reply with the color (optionally a hex like #3B82F6), and I’ll use it going forward.

## Quick picker
- Blue (#3B82F6)
- Green (#10B981)
- Purple (#8B5CF6)
- Red (#EF4444)
- Orange (#F59E0B)
- Pink (#EC4899)
- Teal (#14B8A6)
- Black (#111827)
- White (#F9FAFB)

## Practical tip
- If you share a hex code, I can use it in examples (UI themes, charts, code snippets) and keep it consistent.
